tool_description: Amazon Data Scrapper is a simple API build with node and express.js to get data from Amazom.com in JSON format.
title: Neststack Amazon Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Offers
api_list.description: Get Amazon Product Offers using a product ID.  You will also need  to create an api key from Scraperapi web site

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Reviews
api_list.description: Get Amazon Product Reviews using a product ID.  You will also need  to create an api key from Scraperapi web site

api_list.name: Get Amazon Search Results
api_list.description: Get Amazon Search Results. Use your Sraperapi key and product search query to get the search results
